title: 1972 Balkans Cup
text:
The 1972 Balkans Cup was an edition of the <a href="Balkans%20Cup">Balkans Cup</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition for representative clubs from the <a href="Balkans">Balkan</a> states. It was contested by 6 teams and <a href="PFC%20Botev%20Plovdiv">Trakia Plovdiv</a> won the trophy.
Group A.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Group B.
<onlyinclude></onlyinclude>
Finals.
Second leg.
"Trakia Plovdiv won 5–4 on aggregate."
